import React from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import './formStyle.css' import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup' import axios from 'axios'; import { useState } from 'react'; const Loginform = () => { const [success, setSuccess] = useState(null) const [error, setError] = useState(null) const PASS_REGEX = /^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[a-zA-Z]).{8,}$/ const validationSchema = yup.object({ username: yup.string().min(3, "Please enter your real name").required('Username is required'), email: yup.string().email("Please enter a valid email").required("Email is required"), password: yup.string().matches(PASS_REGEX, "Please enter a strong password").required("Password is required"), confirm_password: yup.string().required('Please confirm your password').oneOf([yup.ref('password')], "Password does not match") }) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { username: '', email: '', password: '', confirm_password: '' }, validateOnBlur: true, // onSubmit, validationSchema: validationSchema }) return (

Welcome BACK!

{/*

Fill in the data below.

*/} {success ? success : error}
{formik.touched.username && formik.errors.username ? formik.errors.username : ""}
{formik.touched.email && formik.errors.email ? formik.errors.email : ""}
{formik.touched.password && formik.errors.password ? formik.errors.password : ""}
{/*
{formik.touched.confirm_password && formik.errors.confirm_password ? formik.errors.confirm_password : ""}
*/}
) } export default Loginform
